title: SPICY COLD TOFU (Liangban Dofu)
directions: Put the soy sauce, bean paste, sesame oil, and sugar in a small bowl. Add half the garlic and half the scallions. Mix it all together. Slice the tofu and lay it in your serving bowl. Drizzle the sauce over it and garnish with the rest of the garlic and scallion on top. You can also garnish with a bit of chopped thai basil and/or cilantro. You can also stir in a chopped thousand year old egg.
ingredients: Optional: chopped thai basil, chopped cilantro, chopped thousand year old egg
